meta.description: Minimize the total time to transport at least 550 locals across a lake using kayaks and motorboats.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Number of people each transportation method can carry per trip.

params.name: time_per_trip
params.description: Time in minutes each transportation method takes per trip.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips made by each transportation method.

objective.name: min_total_time
objective.expr: sum(trips[m] * time_per_trip[m] for m in TRANSPORT_METHODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total time for all trips.

constraints.name: min_people_moved
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(trips[m] * capacity[m] for m in TRANSPORT_METHODS)
constraints.description: At least 550 locals must be moved.

constraints.name: max_motorboat_trips
constraints.description: At most 25 motorboat trips are allowed.

constraints.name: min_kayak_trip_ratio
constraints.description: At least 75% of the trips should be by kayak.
